comment: His lectures are straight from the book. He encourages discussion. He makes the class really fun with silly pics and video clips. He's also pretty laid back in class. There's always a "song of the day". Make sure you read before class because of quizzes. He grades a bit tough on the take home tests. Great class!!

Class is really dull, but Prof Ezquerra knows what he's talking about and if you can make it through a lecture you can learn a lot. Tests are all take home and he gives randomized pop quizzes on readings for attendance grades. You have a week to complete the tests, which are relatively easy.

Very poor excuse for a teacher. He reads from notes and the book, doesn't actaully teach anything and doesn't like to be interrupted for actual discussion. I'm an A student and got a B in this class. He wasn't clear on what his expectations were. He gives pop quizzes that count for an attendance grade. He gives three take home tests. Horrible!!!

He is a new teacher and he teaches very well. His lectures can be a little boring if you already read the text but he always adds in points you may not catch while reading. His tests are take home and are pretty fair. I really enjoy his class and he's really nice to look at.
